features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Complete authentication system with login, password reset, and user management. Supports matrix (admin) and unit (franchise) user types.

features.name: Dashboard System
features.description: Dual dashboard system - matrix panel for administration and unit panel for franchises. Includes KPIs, charts, and analytics.

features.name: Health Plan Management (Ades√µes)
features.description: Complete health plan membership management with enrollment, cancellation, and renewal processes. Includes batch import and Google Sheets integration.

features.name: Cancellation Management
features.description: Health plan cancellation system with automated workflows and status tracking.

features.name: Course Management System
features.description: Complete e-learning platform with course creation, content management, progress tracking, and certificate generation. Dual panel system for content creation (matrix) and consumption (unit).

features.name: Company Management
features.description: Enterprise management system for handling companies, employees, and organizational structure.

features.name: Franchise Management
features.description: Comprehensive franchise management system with unit tracking, franchisee management, and territorial mapping.

features.name: Payment & Checkout System
features.description: Complete payment processing system with multiple payment methods, subscription management, and transparent checkout.

features.name: Quote Management
features.description: Health plan quotation system with pricing calculations and proposal generation.

features.name: Plans Management
features.description: Health plan configuration and management system with pricing and benefits.

features.name: Transaction Management
features.description: Financial transaction tracking and management system with detailed reporting.

features.name: Client Management
features.description: Customer relationship management system for franchises.

features.name: Notification System
features.description: Real-time notification system with sound alerts, push notifications, and notification history.

features.name: Reporting System
features.description: Comprehensive reporting and analytics system with various report types.

features.name: API Management & Monitoring
features.description: API logging, monitoring, and testing system with webhook management.

features.name: User Profile & Settings
features.description: User profile management with settings and preferences.

features.name: Admin Panel
features.description: Administrative panel with user management and system controls.

features.name: Security Management
features.description: Security features including access control, data protection, and audit trails.

features.name: Layout & Navigation
features.description: Responsive layout system with dual panel navigation (matrix/unit) and theming support.

features.name: UI Components Library
features.description: Comprehensive UI component library based on Shadcn/ui and Radix UI with custom styling.
